longBusinessSummary: NHK Spring Co., Ltd. provides automobile, data communications, and industry and lifestyle products in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Automotive Suspension Springs; Automotive Seating; Precision Springs and Components; and Industrial Machinery and Equipment, and Others. Its automobile products include automotive suspension springs, such as coil springs, stabilizers/torsion bars, stabilinkers, and leaf springs; and power train products, and braking and exhaust systems, including valve springs, thin leaf springs for disk brakes, and clutch diaphragms/waved springs/arc springs. The company's automobile products also consist of sporty automotive seats, air suspension seats, axis locks for arm rest, power automotive seats, seals/sheets, screws and bolts, and control cables; motorcycle related chain tensioners; electric related products; thin leaf springs and precision stamped products; and motor cores and integrated metal substrates. Its data communication products comprise HDD-related products, such as suspensions, top covers, disk clamps, dual stage and co-located actuator suspensions, and VCM yokes; data communications and semiconductor device related products, including test sockets, full wafer probe cards, wire springs/precision machine items, lock hinges, and semiconductor process components; electric related products; microcontactor solutions, such as full wafer probe cards, probe cards for wafer and package TAB scans, test sockets, and probe units for flat panel displays and package substrates; and ultra-precision machining technologies. The company's industry and life style products include plant, spring mechanism, chemical, multi-story parking system, anti-counterfeiting, electronic components department, railway, maritime, and sports related products, and products related to various tests and design services. NHK Spring Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1936 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.
